name: Rendezvous in Space
description:
- Use WASD to Stear

- Tap 'E' to go Faster

- Tap 'Q' to go Slower

- Mouse to move your head around

- Try to stay moving forward from where you start. 

You will see another ship. 

- Move close to that ship to initiate the cutscene

- Will loop back to stat after the cutscene

- R will Restart at any point

- 'ESC' to Exit the app

The first 10 seconds is a scene you cannot control. After that, you are able to move the shit. The gold is to simply move forward to the other ship you will see as you move forward. I may change it so the player will have to really navigate at least a decent turn to meet up with the other shitp.
